sub_title: Manager Enterprise Data Global Services & Solutions at FrieslandCampina

projects.title: Implementation DSP platform
projects.description: Implementation of DSP. A platform to facilitate End-to-End Master Data maintenance (create, change, extent, delete) in a validated workflow tool before data is posted in SAP. Approval steps are imbedded and business rules and validates are supporting the content providers and approval. Design & rules/validation setup, testing the design, end-user training & testing, go-live hyper care and business as usual support.

contributors.headline: Manager Enterprise Data Global Services & Solutions at FrieslandCampina

projects.title: Improvement of the team's SLA %
projects.description:
Monitoring the open ticket status. Assigning Data Stewards to a domain or specific data item. Increasing the team's productivity, while retaining a high data quality. 
Creating a workscheme to become highly efficient as a team. 
Interviewing new candidates for our fast growing team and the allocation of new colleagues to a domain that will meet their skills and capabilities.

contributors.headline: Manager Enterprise Data Global Services & Solutions at FrieslandCampina

projects.description:
Collection and input of master data. Check uniqueness and consistency of data. Supporting the global MD process. Authorize data usage and manage the data status. Upload stock and cost prices at Go-Live. 
* JD Edwards 9.0
* JD Edwards 8.11

Steltix, JD Edwards Master Data training

profile_positions.description:
Manager Enterprise Data Global Services & Solutions. The team consists of E2E Business Data Advisors (2), E2E Business Data Analysts (2), MDM Senior Data Stewards (3) and MDM Data Stewards (8). As of December 2018 interim manager of the MDM Data Steward team in Kuala Lumpur – Malaysia (7).
The team operates in 4 domains: Customer Master Data, Finance Master Data and E-banking, Material Masterdata and Vendor Master Data. From the Enterprise Data team, the masterdata of the FrieslandCampina business groups is maintained, managed and monitored. Business rules and validations are in place to facilitate data supporting the local business processes. 
Goal is to manage the maintenance of high quality master data in the SAP systems, in line with agreed KPI's and with excellent customer service. Delivery of on-going data quality maintenance, first-time-right, supported by Data Quality reporting and Data Cleansing. 
Also supporting the FrieslandCampina ‘WIN WIN Mindset & Behaviour’; Purpose driven, Commercially obsessed, Owners' mindset.
My objectives are: lead, engage, motivate, support and inspire the Enterprise Data team. Monitor, organize and coach the team on a day-to-day basis (both in Amersfoort and in an offshore service centre). Being a focal point for the business groups related to E2E Master Data management.
Monitor and report performance (SLA %).
profile_positions.title: Manager Enterprise Data Global Services & Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Senior team member of the Global Master Data Service Centre at Corporate Finance & Reporting.
Change and maintenance of high quality master data in SAP. Providing excellent customer service and act as first line support in terms of point of information and escalation for the business. Checking and approving master data creation and/or change requests in line with data quality standards and agreed governance. Providing the necessary training to local data stewards and power users within the region. Running reports and queries to highlight data quality issues is a regular feature of my role. Monitor our SLA and ensuring that at least 95% of our requests are handled on time. Leading the team through assigning tasks and distributing the workflow.
The Global Master Data Service Centre is involved in a variety of data maintenance activities in the field of customers, vendors, materials, monthly milk prices, quality, finance, personnel and projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Master Data Steward

profile_positions.description:
Since 2008, as Master Data Manager, I am responsible for the maintenance of data in our ERP system: JD Edwards EnterpriseOne. We are active in the food sector; vinegar, syrup, oil, and the non-food sector: cleaning products, automotive, PET bottles. Data from eight international production companies is collected and managed. The aim is to support the local production process, to check uniqueness & consistency of data, but also to improve business intelligence. All with 100% correct data management.  

As a member of the implementation team, I am responsible for investigation and understanding of production processes and finally gathering Master Data information to support the business day-to-day process. The information will be uploaded during test periods and finally at go-live of JD Edwards.
Also the stock upload of finished products, semi-finished products, production and raw materials is my responsibility.

Auditor 'Focus on Quality' an evaluation and training program. The program is developed to increase corporate awareness and to improve international workflows and communication. Manuals and work instructions are evaluated and new documents have been created.
profile_positions.title: Master Data Manager

profile_positions.description:
Leidinggevende bedrijfsbureau (5 medewerkers). Coachen en geleiden van medewerkers. Voeren van functionerings- en beoordelingsgesprekken. Klachtenregistratie. Verantwoordelijk voor voorraadbeheer. Controleren van het bedrijfsproces: afroep grondstoffen, plannen van de productielijnen, sales order afhandeling (EDI orders) en transportplanning. Rekening houdend met beperkte opslag capaciteiten. 
Ondersteunen van en nauw samenwerken met Sales Manager, Purchase Manager, bedrijfsleider en logistiek managers. 
Artikel en receptuurbeheer in AS400 en JD Edwards 8.11.
profile_positions.title: Hoofd bedrijfsbureau

profile_positions.description: Verantwoordelijk voor order afhandeling van limonadesiropen en baby voeding. Samenstellen van rapportages. Aansturen van productieplanners en contactpersoon voor externe transporteurs.
profile_positions.title: Verkoop binnendienst
